participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Alex values deep conversations and enjoys exploring new ideas.
participant_1.background: I'm not ready to tell my family about my sexuality. I listen to the Beatles every morning before work to start my day off on the right foot. I enjoy keeping up with the news and learning about political issues. I don't care about social media as much as I do about my relationships with my friends and family. I have a dog.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and creative, Jamie has a knack for making others smile and enjoys sharing her love for music.
participant_2.background: I enjoy the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar. I love to put a smile on people's faces. I love pizza. I'm not rich, but I do take care of my health. My eyes are brown.

content.text: I always start my day off with the Beatles!
I know it's a cliche, but it's true: music makes everything better.
Right? I love a good song to start my day off on the right foot.
I also love to put a smile on peoples faces.
That's great. I try to be a positive person in general.
What are you interested in?
I'm interested in a lot of things, but I'm passionate about politics.
That's interesting. I'm not really into politics.
What are you interested in?
I'm really interested in music and health.
I love music too! I play guitar.
That's awesome! I love listening to music.
What's your favorite band?
I don't really have a favorite band. I like a lot of different kinds of music.
Me too! I like to listen to a variety of music.
What do you like about music?
I like how it can make me feel. It can make me happy, sad, angry, or anything in between.
I know what you mean. Music can really affect my mood.
It's a powerful thing.
Yeah, it is.
